item.title: Hello, World!
item.description: Hello, World As a first good post this is an intro to me Im a devolper mainly working in python making random things in my spare time. Showcase Some projects I have worked on over a long period of time A discord bot designed with certain features in mind My Github various other misc WIP ideas - mostly unpublished A KubeJS like mod using jython A Python venv CLI for using git repos as a base A projects folder containing unfinished ideas
item.content:
Hello, World

As a first good post this is an intro to me

Im a devolper mainly working in python making random things in my spare time.

Showcase

Some projects I have worked on over a long period of time

  • A discord bot designed with certain features in mind
  • My Github
  • various other misc WIP ideas - mostly unpublished
    • A KubeJS like mod using jython
    • A Python venv CLI for using git repos as a base
    • A projects folder containing unfinished ideas
